document_data.name: Quarrel's Flight
document_data.mainbody: The '''Quarrel's Flight''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved road in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This road ran from north to south, running south off of the [[Wagonrace]] and terminating on [[Caravan Court]].
